subject: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Beneficiary,
This is to officially inform you that we have recovered the sum of $7,500,000.00 USD from the Central Bank of West African States (BCEAO) as an abandoned Contract and Inheritance fund belonging to you.
We advise that you quickly respond to this message and comply with the procedures to enable us to transfer the fund to you without delay. We shall not hesitate to deposit the above mentioned amount into the African Union (AU) Reserved Account, if you fail or delay to respond immediately and claim the fund.
Thanks,
Mr. Roland Ducharme.
Head of the European Commission.
Economic and Monetary Union (EMU) Togo.
Direct Phone +22870005653.

subject: Re:   Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mr. Roland Ducharme,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. It's quite surprising to hear about an abandoned contract and fund belonging to me. I must admit, I'm a bit confused as I don't recall having any business dealings in West Africa.

Could you please provide more details about this contract? How did my name come up in connection with it? And what are the procedures that need to be followed for the transfer of funds?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Craig
